trans-unit.source: Represents audio input that is associated with a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o áudio de entrada associado a um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult" />.

trans-unit.source: A speech recognizer generates information about the audio input as part of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor de fala gera informações sobre a entrada de áudio como parte da operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: To access the recognized audio, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar o áudio reconhecido, use o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> propriedade ou o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> método o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.

trans-unit.source: A recognition result can be produced by the following events and methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes:
trans-unit.target: Resultado de um reconhecimento pode ser produzido pelas seguintes eventos e métodos do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes:

trans-unit.source: Events:
trans-unit.target: Eventos:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Methods:
trans-unit.target: Métodos:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: A recognition result produced by emulated speech recognition does not contain recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: O resultado de um reconhecimento produzido pelo reconhecimento de fala emulado não contém áudio reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: For such a recognition result, its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property returns `null` and its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Para tal um resultado de reconhecimento, seu <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> propriedade retorna `null` e sua <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> método lançará uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: For more information about emulated speech recognition, see the `EmulateRecognize` and `EmulateRecognizeAsync` methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o reconhecimento de fala emulada, consulte o `EmulateRecognize` e `EmulateRecognizeAsync` métodos do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir trata o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos e saídas de informações sobre o áudio reconhecido que está associado com o resultado de reconhecimento da console.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o local no fluxo de áudio de entrada para o início do áudio reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: The location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: O local no fluxo de áudio de entrada para o início do áudio reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade se refere a posição no início da frase reconhecida no fluxo de áudio gerado do dispositivo de entrada.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the `RecognizerAudioPosition` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes reference the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, o `RecognizerAudioPosition` propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes fazem referência a posição do reconhecedor dentro de sua entrada de áudio.

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Essas posições podem ser diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [usando eventos de reconhecimento de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> propriedade obtém a hora do sistema no início da operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir trata o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos e saídas de informações sobre o áudio reconhecido que está associado com o resultado de reconhecimento da console.

trans-unit.source: Gets the duration of the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a duração do fluxo de áudio de entrada para o áudio reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: The duration within the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: A duração dentro do fluxo de áudio de entrada de áudio reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir trata o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos e saídas de informações sobre o áudio reconhecido que está associado com o resultado de reconhecimento da console.

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio processed by a recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato do áudio processado por um mecanismo de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio processed by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: O formato de áudio processado pelo reconhecedor de fala.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir trata o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos e saídas de informações sobre o áudio reconhecido que está associado com o resultado de reconhecimento da console.

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the audio data to be returned.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de partida dos dados de áudio a serem retornados.

trans-unit.source: The length of the segment to be returned.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do segmento a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: Selects and returns a section of the current recognized audio as binary data.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona e retorna uma seção do áudio reconhecido atual como dados binários.

trans-unit.source: Returns a subsection of the recognized audio, as defined by <paramref name="audioPosition" /> and <paramref name="duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma subseção do áudio reconhecido, conforme definido por <paramref name="audioPosition" /> e <paramref name="duration" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar for name input, adds a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event, and loads the grammar into an in-process speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria uma gramática de reconhecimento de fala para entrada de nome, adiciona um manipulador para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> evento e carrega a gramática em um reconhecedor de fala no processo.

trans-unit.source: Then it writes the audio information for the name portion of the input to an audio file.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele grava as informações de áudio para a parte do nome da entrada para um arquivo de áudio.

trans-unit.source: The audio file is used as input to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object, which speaks a phrase that includes the recorded audio.
trans-unit.target: O arquivo de áudio é usado como entrada para uma <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objeto que participa de uma frase que inclui o áudio gravado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="audioPosition" /> and <paramref name="duration" /> define a segment of audio outside the range of the current segment.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="audioPosition" /> e <paramref name="duration" /> definem um segmento de áudio fora do intervalo do segmento atual.

trans-unit.source: The current recognized audio contains no data.
trans-unit.target: O áudio reconhecido atual não contém dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a hora do sistema no início da operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: A hora do sistema no início da operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation, which can be useful for latency and performance calculations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> propriedade obtém a hora do sistema no início da operação de reconhecimento, que pode ser útil para cálculos de latência e o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> property gets the location in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> propriedade obtém o local no fluxo de áudio gerado do dispositivo de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir trata o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos e saídas de informações sobre o áudio reconhecido que está associado com o resultado de reconhecimento da console.

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo que receberá os dados de áudio.

trans-unit.source: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.
trans-unit.target: Grava o áudio inteiro para um fluxo como dados brutos.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form.
trans-unit.target: Dados de áudio são gravados `outputStream` em formato binário.

trans-unit.source: No header information is included.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma informação de cabeçalho está incluída.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> método usa o formato de onda, mas não inclui o cabeçalho do Wave.

trans-unit.source: To include the Wave header, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para incluir o cabeçalho do Wave, use o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo que receberá os dados de áudio.

trans-unit.source: Writes audio to a stream in Wave format.
trans-unit.target: Grava um áudio em um fluxo no formato Wave.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in Wave format, which includes a resource interchange file format (RIFF) header.
trans-unit.target: Dados de áudio são gravados `outputStream` no formato Wave, que inclui um cabeçalho de formato (RIFF) de arquivo de intercâmbio de recurso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the same binary format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> método usa o mesmo formato binário, mas não inclui o cabeçalho do Wave.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar for name input, adds a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event, and loads the grammar into an in-process speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria uma gramática de reconhecimento de fala para entrada de nome, adiciona um manipulador para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> evento e carrega a gramática em um reconhecedor de fala no processo.

trans-unit.source: Then it writes the audio information for the name portion of the input to an audio file.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele grava as informações de áudio para a parte do nome da entrada para um arquivo de áudio.

trans-unit.source: The audio file is used as input to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object, which speaks a phrase that includes the recorded audio.
trans-unit.target: O arquivo de áudio é usado como entrada para uma <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objeto que participa de uma frase que inclui o áudio gravado.
